item.title: A More Sane `yesno()` for devtools
item.description: When working with devtools, you’ll often be asked a yes/no question and get the annoying prompt of three randomly ordered and randomly worded variations of “Yes” and “No”, so that you have to think hard to pick the right one. I get what they’re trying to do (force you to actually think about the question rather than hitting “Y” repeatedly) but I find it very annoying. Here’s a fix. Add this code to your .
